translated:
Wroctaw, #04.2025r (date place) Company name: MWIT EGREGORBUD Sp.
With 0.0.
NIP: 8971894518
Embassy of the Republic of Poland
INFORMATION ABOUT THE WARRANTIES OF AUTHORIZATION

original:
Informuje.
ze warunki na jakich bedzie zatrudniony Pan MOHAMED AMIN BOUJLIDA paszport nr NI25540 sa nastepujacer 1.2 Zatrudnienie na umowie o prace.
2.
Wynagrodzenie platne 6000 zi brutto/miesiecznie, 3.
Uriop wypoczynkowy - udzielany zgodnie z polskim Kodeksem Pracy, 4. Ubezpieczenie zdrowotne NFZIZUS - oplacane przez pracodawce.
translated:
Informs.
with the conditions on which Mr. MOHAMED AMIN BOUJLIDA will be employed passport No NI25540 is following 1.2 Employment on employment contract.
2.
Salary payable 6000 days gross/monthly, 3.
Vacation insurance - granted in accordance with the Polish Labour Code, 4. Health insurance NFZIZUS - paid by the employer.

original:
Informuie.
ze nadaloczekuie na przybycie tegopracownika
translated:
Information.
with still waiting for this worker to arrive
